Package com.datastrcrew.libraryapi.classes

Interface Publication

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Publication>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPublication, Book, Encyclopedia, Magazine
public interface Publication
extends java.lang.Comparable<Publication>
Publication interface for all publications of the Library Automation System. (publication,Encyclopedia,Magazine)
Author:
gokbey_gazi_keskin
